citations.narrative:
During the inspection it was noted that the wooden / rope bridge apparatus in the bengal cat enclosure was in need of
repair. There are two ropes that are strung between wood slats. However, the rope was broken on the left side. This now
allowed the bridge to fall sideways. This apparatus needs to be addressed.
***To Be Corrected By: January 14, 2022
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
End Section

narrative:
3.6(a)(2)(ii) 
   
Primary enclosures. 
During the inspection it was noted that the wooden / rope bridge apparatus in the bengal cat enclosure was in need of 
repair. There are two ropes that are strung between wood slats. However, the rope was broken on the left side. This now 
allowed the bridge to fall sideways. This apparatus needs to be addressed. 
***To Be Corrected By: January 14, 2022 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
End Section

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
